data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Chhota Udaipur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chhota Udaipur, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Chhota Udaipur, Gujarat, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Chhota Udaipur, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Chhota Udaipur, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Panar people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please give the people in the county of Chhota Udaipur access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, move the 299 believers in the county of Chhota Udaipur to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Chhota Udaipur, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Chhota Udaipur
location.people_groups_list: Vitholia, Maru Kumhar, Koli of Sind (Hindu traditions), Dubla, Barutgar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vitholia (25,000), Maru Kumhar (3,500), Koli of Sind (Hindu traditions) (79,000), Dubla (675,000), Barutgar (1,100)
